text: Usually good service but today my pizza was slid to one side and my chicken wings container smashed on top. It wasn't even cut all the way through.

text: Food is good, only reason for 3 stars. A lady brought out our food while she was talking on her cell phone. Like an iPhone. Which was completely rude. They messed our order up and brought out food to the tables that came in after us. The sweet tea tastes like syrup that has been setting there all day.

text: I haven't had pizza hut in a long time and never from this location, but it was surprisingly extremely delicious!

text: There is good service there, the employees are really approachable, and there's generally a relaxed vibe within the place. They don't sell small pizzas, but they do sell everything else.

name: David Woodruff
text: Very clean very friendly and welcoming. A nice bright atmosphere good accommodations for larger groups. You are invited to watch your pizza being made and everything is served hot or cold as appropriate. A good choice for couples families and groups.

name: Anzinetti Rezents
text: Pizza is the only pizza company that serves thin and crispy pizza crust.

name: Enrique Ibarra
text: Place was not to capacity but busy. It was a buffet but had to wait several times for pizza to be set at the buffet bar. They had only one waitress yet three bus boys. On the other hand, the waitress was courteous and friendly. Food was delicious.

name: David Murai
text: Who doesnt like pizza?

name: Teresa Belangeri
text: Love their lunch salad/pizza buffet. They give a nice senior price on the buffet. They are moving across the way from their  current location to a brand new building so we'll see how that goes; it looks smaller.

name: Kasey Murray
text: Just called to order 2 large pizzas. The man was very rude when I asked him to repeat himself. He was talking extremely fast as if he was trying to rush me off the phone. Hopefully the pizza is better than the person they have answering the phone for them.

name: Betsy Lievanos Gray
text: Quick and unbelievably friendly service!! From the second we walked in we were greeted so kindly by at least two cashiers/waiters. Perfect service. üëçüëçüëçüëç

name: Montie Morrison
text: The pizza was by far the best I've had in a while. The wait time was a little long but the pizza made up for it. My only complaint is there's a sign that's not near the actual pizza hut, and the soap dispenser was not working in the women's restroom. Overall a good pizza hut.

name: Ariadne Jordan
text: Awful service. Had one girl, a girl named Brandie, and she was a horrid thing. No manners, nasty, and just plain awful. I don't have a single good thing to say about her, or the place. Don't recommend, at all.
